8250.quoteText: Many pages within usf.edu use Google Analytics (Google Analytics Security and Privacy Principles).
8250.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

8252.quoteText: Our servers automatically recognize the domain and IP address from which you accessed the website, and we record related information that helps us make our site more accessible, such as information about operating systems, screen resolutions and the volume and timing of access.
8252.title: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

tosdr.case: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

8253.quoteText: The university reserves the right to amend these privacy terms at any time without notice.
8253.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

8254.quoteText: he University of South Florida does not collect personal information about you when you visit an official USF website, unless you affirmatively choose to make such information available to us.
8254.title: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

tosdr.case: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

8255.quoteText: but we will not disclose the information to third parties or government agencies unless required to do so by state or federal law or by your specific permission.
8255.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

tosdr.case: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

8256.quoteText: Because we encourage the development and deployment of technology in an environment of academic freedom, we cannot ensure that all websites within the usf.edu domain are in strict compliance with this policy at all times.
8256.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

tosdr.case: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
